question_sentence: Which over-the-counter medication has President Donald Trump controversially linked to autism?
evidence: President Trump made an announcement Monday linking autism to Tylenol use during pregnancy, contradicting decades of evidence that it’s safe.

question_sentence: Which type of natural disaster recently forced a massive evacuation in southern China?
evidence: Nearly 2 million people in China’s Guangdong province were evacuated as Typhoon Ragasa slammed into one of the world's most densely populated coasts.

question_sentence: Which political figure kicked off a book tour this week?
evidence: Former Vice President Kamala Harris kicked off her book tour this week in New York City, with both supporters and protesters in attendance.

question_sentence: What recently caused widespread check-in disruptions at major European airports, including London’s Heathrow?
evidence: A man was arrested this week in connection with a cyberattack that knocked out automatic check-in systems at some of Europe’s busiest airports.

question_sentence: Global leaders gathered in New York City this week to attend which annual meeting?
evidence: World leaders convened at the 80th United Nations General Assembly at UN headquarters in Manhattan.

question_sentence: Which Jewish holiday was celebrated this week?
evidence: Rosh Hashanah, the Jewish New Year, began at sundown on Monday and was celebrated through nightfall on Wednesday.

question_sentence: Around what year is NASA planning to de-orbit and retire the International Space Station?
evidence: NASA is working with private companies to develop a modern successor to the aging International Space Station. The agency plans to de-orbit the ISS around 2030.

question_sentence: A massive memorial service was recently held for conservative political activist Charlie Kirk in which state?
evidence: Tens of thousands of mourners gathered inside a stadium in Glendale, Arizona, to pay tribute to Charlie Kirk.

question_sentence: What is the mandatory retirement age for commercial airline pilots?
evidence: Pilots of commercial aircraft are currently required to retire at 65 years old. Some lawmakers are calling for a new international standard to increase the age limit.

question_sentence: What is the list price of Apple’s latest top-of-the-line iPhone?
evidence: It costs about $2,000 to buy Apple's new iPhone 17 Pro Max, if buyers choose the version with two terabytes of storage. It's now one of the most expensive phones on the market.
